entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:36 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 6:58 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
